attributes.action: Make all schools have more lessons about how disablities effect various people
attributes.additional_details: I want the government or parliment to do more pol ed lessons based on how disabilites can massively effect various people because i feel like in the 21st century people bully the disabled. Many of the people whom are the bullies have no idea what the certain person has gone through from a young age or throughout their life. I feel like we need more education on how certain abilites may act onto someone and we need to make it mandatory.
attributes.background: I want the government or parliment to make it mandatory that all primary and seccondary should have more than a singular lesson on pol ed about how certain disabilites can effect some adults or children.
